title: BUGSPLAT LOSING ME LP
body:
I got a bug splat.... I couldn't rejoin the game it kept saying there was an issue with my internet which there wasn't and then it said "make sure your drivers are up-to-date" which they are...
FINALLY I got back in and my team was in the middle to remaking... and I lost 16 LP WTF GIVE ME BACK MY LP ITS YOUR CODING THAT LOST ME IT. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body: Bugsplats can be really bothersome, but overall we can't adjust LP for something like connections or crashes. I'd be sure to run a repair to make sure there aren't any damaged game files causing the crash, but it'd also be really good to go over the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to make sure you aren't missing anything.
